mapper.update: UPDATE PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_GRP_PERSON T SET T.HR_ID=#{hrNum},T.HQ_CHAN_CODE=#{chanCode},T.HQ_CHAN_NAME=#{chanName} WHERE T.DEVELOPER=#{devNum} AND T.DEAL_DATE=#{dealDate}

MERGE INTO PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_GRP_PERSON T USING PORTAL.APDP_USER T1 ON (T.HR_ID=T1.HR_ID) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET T.USERID=T1.ID ,T.PHONE=T1.PHONE ,T.ACCOUNT=T1.USERNAME ,T.NAME=T1.REALNAME WHERE T.DEVELOPER=#{devNum} AND T.DEAL_DATE=#{dealDate} AND T.HR_ID=#{hrNum}

select.if: SELECT REALNAME FROM PORTAL.APDP_USER T WHERE T.ORG_ID IN ( SELECT T.PARENT_ID FROM PORTAL.APDP_ORG T WHERE T.CODE IN (SELECT T.GROUP_iD_4 FROM PCDE.TB_CDE_CHANL_HQ_CODE T WHERE T.HQ_CHAN_CODE=#{chanCode}) ) AND T.ENABLED=1 AND T.HR_ID=#{hrNum} UNION ALL SELECT REALNAME FROM PORTAL.APDP_USER T WHERE T.ORG_ID IN( SELECT ID FROM PORTAL.APDP_ORG T WHERE ORGLEVEL=1 START WITH T.CODE IN (SELECT T.GROUP_iD_4 FROM PCDE.TB_CDE_CHANL_HQ_CODE T WHERE T.HQ_CHAN_CODE=#{chanCode}) CONNECT BY PRIOR T.PARENT_ID=T.ID) AND T.ENABLED=1 AND T.HR_ID=#{hrNum}

SELECT REALNAME FROM PORTAL.APDP_USER T WHERE T.ORG_ID IN ( SELECT T.PARENT_ID FROM PORTAL.APDP_ORG T WHERE T.CODE IN (SELECT T.GROUP_iD_4 FROM PCDE.TB_CDE_CHANL_HQ_CODE T WHERE T.HQ_CHAN_CODE=#{chanCode}) ) AND T.ENABLED=1 AND T.HR_ID=#{hrNum} UNION ALL SELECT REALNAME FROM PORTAL.APDP_USER T WHERE T.ORG_ID IN( SELECT ID FROM PORTAL.APDP_ORG T WHERE ORGLEVEL=2 START WITH T.CODE IN (SELECT T.GROUP_iD_4 FROM PCDE.TB_CDE_CHANL_HQ_CODE T WHERE T.HQ_CHAN_CODE=#{chanCode}) CONNECT BY PRIOR T.PARENT_ID=T.ID) AND T.ENABLED=1 AND T.HR_ID=#{hrNum}

mapper.select: SELECT T1.GROUP_ID_4_NAME FROM PCDE.TB_CDE_CHANL_CODE T JOIN PCDE.TB_CDE_CHANL_HQ_CODE T1 ON (T.HQ_CHAN_CODE = T1.HQ_CHAN_CODE) WHERE T.FD_CHNL_CODE = #{devNum} AND T.HQ_CHAN_CODE = #{chanCode} AND T.HQ_CHAN_CODE IN (SELECT HQ_CHAN_CODE FROM PCDE.TAB_CDE_CHANL_HQ_CODE T WHERE T.UNIT_iD = (SELECT DISTINCT UNIT_ID FROM PCDE.TAB_CDE_CHANL_HQ_CODE WHERE HQ_CHAN_CODE = #{chanCode}))

choose.when: select t.id as "id", t.code as "groupId", t.orgname as "name", t.orglevel as "lev", t.parent_id as "pId", CASE t.orglevel WHEN '1' THEN 'true' WHEN '2' THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END "isParent" from portal.apdp_org t where t.code = #{groupId}
choose.otherwise: select t.id as "id", t.code as "groupId", t.orgname as "name", t.orglevel as "lev", t.parent_id as "pId", CASE t.orglevel WHEN '1' THEN 'true' WHEN '2' THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END "isParent" from portal.apdp_org t where t.parent_id in(select o.id from portal.apdp_org o where o.code = #{groupId})

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_GRP_PERSON SELECT T3.ID,T3.REALNAME,T3.USERNAME,T3.PHONE,T2.GROUP_ID_4,T2.UNIT_ID,T2.GROUP_ID_1,T2.HQ_CHAN_CODE ,2,T2.UNIT_NAME,T2.GROUP_ID_1_NAME,SYSDATE,'','绑定',#{grpType} ,'',T2.GROUP_ID_4_NAME,#{hrNum},#{devNum},'',#{userName},#{dealDate},'',1,#{dealDate} FROM PCDE.TB_CDE_CHANL_CODE T4 JOIN PCDE.TAB_CDE_CHANL_HQ_CODE T2 ON (T4.HQ_CHAN_CODE=T2.HQ_CHAN_CODE) JOIN PORTAL.APDP_USER T3 ON (#{hrNum}=T3.HR_ID) WHERE T2.GROUP_ID_1=#{regionCode} and T4.FD_CHNL_CODE=#{devNum} and NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_GRP_PERSON T WHERE #{devNum}=T.DEVELOPER AND T.DEAL_DATE=#{dealDate})
mapper.select:
SELECT T1.REALNAME, T1.USERNAME,T1.HR_ID,T.CODE FROM PORTAL.APDP_USER T1 JOIN PORTAL.APDP_ORG T ON T1.ORG_ID = T.ID WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM PORTAL.VIEW_U_PORTAL_PERSON T2 WHERE T2.DEAL_DATE=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM') AND T1.ID=T2.USERID AND T2.GROUP_ID_1=#{regionCode} AND T2.UNIT_ID <>#{unit_id}) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM PORTAL.APDP_ORG T3 WHERE T1.ORG_ID=T3.ID AND T3.REGION_CODE=#{regionCode} ) AND T1.ENABLED=1
AND T1.HR_ID LIKE #{hr_id}
